featuresSection.heading: Exclusive Rental Property Types Available When You Rent House in Sector 78 Gurgaon
description: Sector 78 offers a diverse portfolio of housing options ensuring that individuals, couples, and large families can all find suitable accommodation. Our listings include properties from renowned builders known for quality construction and excellent amenities.

Understanding the type and size of the rental unit is crucial for making the right choice. Here is a look at the various residential configurations you can find when looking for a house for rent in Sector 78 Gurgaon covering everything from compact modern flats to expansive independent houses.

features.title: Studio and 1 BHK Apartments
features.description: Perfect for bachelors, students, or young professionals, these compact units offer efficiency and modern living within secure complexes. They are typically lower maintenance and provide excellent value for money while maintaining access to all community amenities in Sector 78.

features.title: 2 BHK Residential Flats
features.description: Ideal for nuclear families or couples who desire a dedicated guest room or home office space. Two-bedroom apartments in Sector 78 are highly sought after due to their balance of affordability, space, and modern layouts provided by top developers in the area.

features.title: 3 BHK Luxury Residences
features.description: The most common and popular configuration, 3 BHK houses for rent offer ample space for growing families. These units often feature large balconies, servant quarters, and access to premium clubhouse facilities and extensive green spaces within the projects.

features.title: 4 BHK Independent Floors
features.description: For those prioritizing privacy and space over high-rise living, independent floors offer an entire level of a building. This option provides the feeling of an independent house with the benefits of a managed community setting in Sector 78 Gurgaon.

features.title: Premium Builder Floors
features.description: Modern builder floors in Sector 78 boast contemporary architecture, high-quality fittings, and dedicated parking. Renting a builder floor is an excellent choice for tenants looking for modern infrastructure without the strict regulations of high-rise societies.

features.title: Spacious Independent Houses and Villas
features.description: Experience unparalleled luxury and maximum privacy by renting a standalone house or villa. These properties typically come with private gardens, dedicated parking, and expansive living areas suitable for large or joint families seeking the best Sector 78 offers.

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About How to Rent House in Sector 78 Gurgaon
faqSection.description: We address the most common queries potential tenants have about pricing, availability, and the rental process in this sought-after Gurgaon location.

faqs.question: What is the typical rental price range for a 3 BHK house in Sector 78 Gurgaon
faqs.answer: The rental price for a 3 BHK unit in Sector 78 varies significantly based on the project brand, the floor level, whether it is semi-furnished or fully furnished, and the specific amenities provided by the society. Generally, you can expect the monthly rent for a standard 3 BHK apartment to range from approximately ₹25,000 to ₹45,000. Luxury or larger 3 BHK units in premium societies near the Dwarka Expressway may command higher rents. Always check the current market rates with a local expert for the most accurate figure.

faqs.question: Are there fully furnished rental houses available in Sector 78 and what is the cost difference
faqs.answer: Yes, many landlords in Sector 78 offer fully furnished rental homes, which is a great option for tenants relocating from other cities or those preferring zero hassle. A fully furnished house for rent typically includes essential furniture like beds, sofas, dining sets, and white goods such as air conditioners and refrigerators. The cost difference compared to a semi-furnished unit usually adds 15% to 30% to the base rental price, depending on the quality and extent of the furnishings provided.

faqs.question: What lease duration is common for house rentals in Sector 78
faqs.answer: The standard lease duration for residential properties in Sector 78 and across Gurgaon is 11 months, which is often renewable upon mutual agreement. Some corporate leases or long-term tenants might secure a 12-month or 24-month contract. Landlords generally prefer longer leases for stability. Be sure to discuss the renewal clauses and notice period clearly before signing the rental agreement.

faqs.question: Is Sector 78 a safe neighborhood for families to rent a house
faqs.answer: Absolutely Sector 78 is considered one of the safer and more organized sectors in New Gurgaon. Most rental houses are located within gated residential complexes which offer multi-tier security systems, including 24/7 security guards, boom barriers, and extensive CCTV coverage. The area is well-lit and the presence of reputable residential communities contributes to a highly secure and family-friendly environment.

faqs.question: How close is Sector 78 to major employment hubs like Cyber City
faqs.answer: Sector 78 is strategically located with excellent road connectivity. While it is in New Gurgaon, major employment hubs are accessible. Cyber City is approximately 45 to 60 minutes away depending on traffic conditions, primarily accessed via NH-48. The proximity to IMT Manesar is much shorter, usually taking only 15 to 25 minutes, making it highly convenient for those working in the industrial and commercial areas closer to the Kherki Daula region.

faqs.question: What are the typical maintenance charges and are they included in the rent
faqs.answer: In large residential societies in Sector 78, maintenance charges cover common area upkeep, security, power backup, and amenities like the clubhouse. These charges usually range from ₹3 to ₹5 per square foot per month. Whether maintenance charges are included in the monthly rent depends entirely on the specific lease agreement with the landlord. Always clarify if the quoted rent is inclusive or exclusive of society maintenance fees before finalizing the deal.

faqs.question: What documentation is required when securing a house rental in Sector 78
faqs.answer: To secure a rental house, tenants are typically required to provide proof of identity such as Aadhar Card and PAN Card, address proof, and often employer details or salary slips for verification. For the rental agreement, both the tenant and landlord need to provide photographs and signatures. Foreign nationals require passport copies and relevant visa documentation.

faqs.question: Are pet-friendly rental houses easily available in this sector
faqs.answer: Finding a pet-friendly rental house in Sector 78 can sometimes be challenging as it often depends on the specific society rules and the individual landlord’s preference. While some modern complexes are open to pets, it is crucial to state your requirement upfront. We maintain a specific list of pet-friendly houses for rent to assist tenants with this specific need, ensuring a smoother search process.

faqs.question: What is the typical security deposit amount required for renting a house here
faqs.answer: The standard security deposit required to rent house in Sector 78 Gurgaon is equivalent to two months' worth of rent. This deposit is held by the landlord throughout the tenancy period and is refundable upon vacating the premises, subject to deductions for any damages beyond normal wear and tear or unpaid utility bills. Negotiation on the deposit amount is sometimes possible depending on the rental market conditions.

faqs.question: Can I find rental properties near the Dwarka Expressway in Sector 78
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 78 is one of the key sectors located favorably near the highly strategic Dwarka Expressway. Many premium residential projects and independent houses for rent in Sector 78 offer direct or very easy access to this expressway, which significantly enhances connectivity towards Gurgaon and other parts of Gurgaon. This location is ideal for those prioritizing travel convenience.
